javadoc:
The RTTI4 data type represents a CompleteObjectLocator structure.

Fields for this RunTimeTypeInformation structure can be found on http://www.openrce.org 

 struct CompleteObjectLocator {
     dword signature;
     dword offset;             // offset of vbtable within class
     dword cdOffset;           // constructor displacement offset
     4byte_ptr_or_disp pRtti0; // ref to TypeDescriptor (RTTI 0) for class
     4byte_ptr_or_disp pRtti3; // ref to ClassHierarchyDescriptor (RTTI 3)
 }

RTTI_Complete_Object_Locator is the label for the RTTI4 data structure. @deprecated Use of this dynamic data type class is no longer recommended. Instead a CompleteObjectLocator structure data type can be obtained using the Rtti4Model.

Creates a dynamic Complete Object Locator data type.
@param dtm the data type manager for this data type.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: dtm
params.comment: the data type manager for this data type.

methods.name: getLength
methods.comment:
Gets the total length of the data created when this data type is placed at the indicated 
 address in memory.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory for this data.

params.name: address
params.comment: the start address of the data.

return.comment:
the length of the data. zero is returned if valid data can't be created at the 
 indicated address using this data type.

methods.name: getRtti0Address
methods.comment:
Gets the address of the RTTI0 that is referred to from an RTTI4 structure that is placed at 
 the indicated address.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the memory with the data for the RTTI structures.

return.comment: the address of the RTTI0 structure or null.

methods.name: getRtti3Address
methods.comment:
Gets the address of the RTTI3 that is referred to from an RTTI4 structure that is placed at 
 the indicated address.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the memory with the data for the RTTI structures.

return.comment: the address of the RTTI3 structure or null.
